Class LinearRegressionTrendLine

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTrendLine

        public PointListList.PointList calculateTrendLine(PointListList.PointList originalPoints)
        Calculates a trend line using linear regression. At least two points need to be in originalPoints, otherwise it fails.
        Specified by:
        calculateTrendLine in interface TrendLineAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        originalPoints - the original points
        Returns:
        a new PointListList.PointList if successful or null
